decision_conditions: <p>All new materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building.<br><br>REASON: In the interest of visual amenity.</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-88ec3371-7fff-00d5-fdb6-e2876d553417"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system (i.e. water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-88ec3371-7fff-00d5-fdb6-e2876d553417"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; white-space: normal;">REASON: To mitigate against the impacts of surface water flooding.</span><br></span></span><br></p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves of the mansard roof extension prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of biodiversity.</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Erection of a hybrid mansard roof extension with front roof terrace; and a rear single-storey wrap around extension.
